member.name: T:Unity.PerformanceTesting.Meters.StopWatch
member.summary: Takes use of System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch to provide stopwatch functionality implementing IStopWatch

member.name: T:Unity.PerformanceTesting.Meters.IStopWatch
member.summary: Provides stopwatch functionality for measuring time

member.name: M:Unity.PerformanceTesting.Meters.IStopWatch.Split
member.summary: Takes a split time since start of stopwatch
member.returns: Time passed since start in milliseconds
